front.title: IEEE Guide--Adoption of ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 Systems and Software Engineering-- Life Cycle Management-- Part 2: Guide to the Application of ISO/IEC 15288 (System Life Cycle Processes)

abstract.t: ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is a guide for the application of ISO/IEC 15288:2008. It addresses system, life cycle, process, organizational, project, and adaptation concepts, principally through reference to ISO/IEC TR 24748-1 and ISO/IEC 15288:2008. It then gives guidance on applying ISO/IEC 15288:2008 from the aspects of strategy, planning, application in organizations, and application on projects.
